name: Money Dungeon
description:
Hey !

Here is my submission for #LD40 ! That is a simple roguelike where you search for money. You see some coins on the ground, but when you pick them, some people began attacking you. You run and fall in front of a mysterious door. What could be behind it ?

Hope you will enjoy the game and thanks for playing !

Do not forget to share, follow and like the game, I may continue developping the game ; )

See ya !

Here is the LD page of the game : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/$49915
